name: tileimage
short_description:
tileimage - or maketiles - generates Transition tiles for a set of Input Images. That is Images that can be put in between two Input Images to avoid a visible crack when stiching the tiles together. More exactly one Input Image is Chosen for each of the Corners of the resulting Image and the blending is done by interpolating the Image weights at each Corner.
The package contains a command line tool as well as a gimp-plugin (although for Performance reasons the plugin should not be used).
summary: generate transition tiles for a set of images
